attributes.action: Make the Covid vaccine free to everyone.
attributes.additional_details: In France the Covid vaccine is free to all. There is a small €7:50 administration fee which is reimbursed to French residents. In England a Covid vaccine costs £98. This makes it far less likely that people will get the vaccine. More people will get Covid putting the NHS under greater strain and losing more working days.
attributes.background: To reduce the impact on the NHS the Covid vaccine should be free to all.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Fund COVID booster vaccines for the general public 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/745188
